mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.ROOMCODE, A.NAME ROOMNAME, B.NAME TYPENAME, A.HOWMANY, A.HOWMUCH FROM ROOM A INNER JOIN ROOMTYPE B ON A.TYPE = B.TYPECODE WHERE A.ROOMCODE IN (SELECT ROOMCODE FROM ROOM MINUS SELECT DISTINCT ROOMCODE FROM BOOKING WHERE CHECKIN < #{param2} AND CHECKOUT > #{param1}) ORDER BY A.ROOMCODE

SELECT A.ROOMCODE, A.NAME ROOMNAME, B.NAME TYPENAME, A.HOWMANY, A.HOWMUCH, C.CHECKIN, C.CHECKOUT, C.BOOKCODE, C.MOBILE, C.NAME, C.PERSON FROM ROOM A INNER JOIN ROOMTYPE B ON A.TYPE = B.TYPECODE LEFT JOIN BOOKING C ON A.ROOMCODE = C.ROOMCODE WHERE ((B.NAME != #{param3} AND C.CHECKIN < #{param2} AND C.CHECKOUT > #{param1}) OR (B.NAME = #{param3} AND C.CHECKIN < #{param2} AND C.CHECKOUT > #{param1})) ORDER BY C.CHECKIN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKING(ROOMCODE, PERSON, CHECKIN, CHECKOUT, NAME, MOBILE) VALUES(#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOKING SET PERSON=#{param2}, NAME=#{param3}, MOBILE=#{param4} WHERE BOOKCODE=#{param1}
